com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class Ev3ColorSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.LegoMindstormsEv3Base
        • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.LegoMindstormsEv3Sensor
          • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.Ev3ColorSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BluetoothConnectionListener, Component, Deleteable

    public class Ev3ColorSensor
extends LegoMindstormsEv3Sensor
implements Deleteable
    A component that provides a high-level interface to a color sensor on a LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 robot.
    Author:
    jerry73204@gmail.com (jerry73204), spaded06543@gmail.com (Alvin Chang)
